__e: But I didn't. And now he wants to read it, and I don't know what to do.
People are gonna read that and go, "what's that all about?"
Now she's gonna read it, and she's gonna think it's from me!
I'm sorry, but you're going to have to read that in tomorrow's paper, all right?
I'll tell you one thing for the case where you would not see it:
I always feel like reading it at this time of the year.
Unless, he doesn't have to read it all, but it's just to get him started.
But the fact is that the more you talk what you don't want, or you talk about how bad it is, read about all of that all the time and then say, "oh how terrible it is", you are creating more of that.
And I wouldn't mind, except that I have to read them all, too.
